dublin_core.dcvalue: 2013 Acumen and IDEO org Human Centered Design for Social Innovation is a five week course that will introduce you to the concepts of human centered design and help you use the design process to create innovative effective and sustainable solutions for social change No prior design experience necessary See also IDEO s Human Centered Design Toolkit
